skill.name: founder-os
skill.description: Manages founder business portfolio, signals, vault, and snapshots. Tracks business health, stores credentials securely, and generates AI-powered business analytics and recommendations.
skill.summary: Manages founder business portfolio, signals, vault, and snapshots. Tracks business health, stores cr...
skill.author: CleanExpo

security_audit.summary: Pure documentation skill with no executable code. Only contains markdown describing skill behavior, capabilities, and prompts. No network calls, file access, command execution, or environment variable access.

content.value_statement: Founders struggle to monitor multiple ventures and metrics across businesses. Founder OS provides a unified command center to track signals, generate health snapshots, and make data-driven strategic decisions.
actual_capabilities: Register and manage multiple businesses and ventures
Track business signals including revenue, growth, and engagement metrics
Generate AI-powered health snapshots with SWOT analysis
Store credentials securely with encryption and audit logging
Provide strategic recommendations based on performance data
Analyze options and support major business decisions
limitations: No real-time financial data integration with Stripe, AWS, or other services
No automated business actions without founder approval

use_cases.title: Multi-venture portfolio tracking
use_cases.description: Monitor health and metrics across all registered businesses from one dashboard

use_cases.title: Strategic decision support
use_cases.description: Get data-driven analysis for hiring, fundraising, and market expansion decisions

use_cases.title: Weekly health snapshots
use_cases.description: Generate regular snapshots identifying risks, opportunities, and recommended actions

prompt_templates.title: Register business
prompt_templates.prompt: Register my [business name] startup in the [industry] sector. Details: [stage], [team size], [target market], [website]

prompt_templates.title: Check health
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a health snapshot for [business name] and show key metrics and trends from last month

prompt_templates.title: Strategic analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Should we [major decision]? Analyze our options using our current metrics and provide recommendations with pros and cons

prompt_templates.title: Vault management
prompt_templates.prompt: Store my [service] API key securely and set up automatic rotation every [time period]

output_examples.input: Generate a health snapshot for TechStartup Inc
output: Key strengths: Strong NRR at 108%, healthy LTV:CAC ratio
Recommended action: Launch EU pilot with $50k budget

best_practices: Update metrics weekly for accurate health scoring
Use Extended Thinking for major strategic decisions
Enable alerts for critical thresholds like runway and churn
anti_patterns: Relying solely on snapshots without manual review
Making automated business changes without founder approval
Storing sensitive vault credentials without rotation schedules

faq.question: What AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: Currently optimized for Claude. Support for Codex and Claude Code coming soon.

faq.question: How many businesses can I track?
faq.answer: No hard limit. All registered businesses appear in portfolio view with filtering options.

faq.question: Does it integrate with my existing tools?
faq.answer: Currently supports email and Slack for alerts. API integrations planned for future releases.

faq.question: How secure is the credential vault?
faq.answer: Uses AES-256 encryption with audit logging and time-limited access tokens.

faq.question: Why does health score change?
faq.answer: Health scores update when new signals are tracked. Review snapshot details for contributing factors.

faq.question: How is this different from a spreadsheet?
faq.answer: Provides AI-powered analysis, automatic health scoring, trend detection, and strategic recommendations.
